law.catch_line: Injury in one county, death in another.
law.text: Where an injury is inflicted or poison is administered in one county and death ensues in another, the trial for the homicide may be in either county.
law.history: Reenacted 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 40. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1147.
